meanings.definition: A person or thing that inserts.
meanings.sent1: The inserters carefully placed the letters into the mailbox.
meanings.sent2: The inserters at the factory work efficiently to assemble the products.
meanings.sent3: The inserters at the party were the ones who made sure everyone had a name tag.
meanings.sent4: She was like an inserters, seamlessly weaving the threads of conversation together.
meanings.sent5: The inserters in the game were the key to solving the puzzle.

meanings.definition: A device used for inserting something into something else.
meanings.sent1: The inserters on the assembly line helped speed up production.
meanings.sent2: The inserters in the printer smoothly fed the paper through for printing.
meanings.sent3: The inserters in the kitchen drawer always seem to disappear when you need them.
meanings.sent4: The key felt like an inserters, smoothly fitting into the lock.
meanings.sent5: The inserters in the vending machine dispensed snacks with precision.
